actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. McDermott.
On agreeing to the McDermott amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 196 - 226 (Roll no. 291).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to delete the Health Insurance Tax Credit Waiver; expand the Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC) for children; provide relief to families of astronauts and military members; limit EITC precertification; address corporate tax shelters; and add protections to assist low and middle income tax payers.
purpose: Part B amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 108-158.
